response.overview: Cengiz, who has been crushed under the financial difficulties he has been through and is seen as responsible for everything by his wife, looks for a way out of the situation he is in. Meanwhile, Cengiz, who comes to his wife's fill, goes after a treasure that is not good for his brother-in-law. Cengiz, who finds Mustafa and learns the location of the treasure, can't prevent the demons from haunting his daughter, even if he sticks to his plan and obeys all the rules. They find themselves in a bigger nightmare on this road they entered by dreaming of a comfortable life. Although they give up the life they dreamed of to save their daughter, it is too late for everything now.
response.title: İblis Karanlığın Sahibi 2
